title: I literally exploded when I heard project Jhins ult theme.
body:
WANT FULL VERSION DAMMIT.
I really like how his theme fits any style just how Jhin himself can blend into any disguise as in lore.

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Glad you're enjoying the Project Jhin music. Here's the track I wrote for his in-game music: 

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-jhin-neon-cherry-blossoms](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-jhin-neon-cherry-blossoms)

The rest of the ULT stuff comes from the login screen music:

[https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-hunters-login-music](https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/project-hunters-login-music)

Enjoy!

Ed the Conqueror

Oh thank you very much!
Jhin is just my favorite champion in the game! In theme and game as well.
It is so good you are bringing many versions of him in skins that has totally different aspects.
Just Started a petition post for this https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/zs3P5VtH-little-early-but-here-is-a-petition-for-a-full-remix-of-jhins-login-in-the-project-jhin-style
